system.descriptor: Some additional Uses for Medicae (Diagnose, Chem-Use)
system.uses:
Diagnose: Test to Diagnose Disease or other Ailment in target individual or group. On success know ailment and basic treatment, and prevent spread or mitigate effects in groups.
Chem-Use: Medicae Test to Apply Poison/Chemicals, if 4+ DoF something goes very wrong. Medicae Test to create Drug/Poison with ingredients/recipes/lab. Medicae Test to create Antidote to identified Poison or Toxin and possessing correct materials. Requires Poison sample, or blood from poisoned, Basic Medikit and Extended Test of 4-10 DoS, success creates 2d10 Antidotes for poison, takes 1d10 hours.
system.useTime: Full Action or More for complex problems
